name: LingerToAlive
description:
Introduction to the game:
1. A simple third person survival shooting game
2. In the game, players need to use their only weapon resources to fight against unknown mutant creatures and finally escape successfully
3. There is only one map in the game, and other maps will be updated in the future
4. This game has no archiving system, so be careful at all times. Once you fail, you have to start again
5. Don't have too high expectations about this game
6. In terms of plot, yes! But only one thing
Author's words:
This game is only made by me. All models and animations are made by myself and the sound effects of monsters are dubbed by myself
Therefore, if you feel that the model is not good, or that you feel unhappy in other aspects, please forgive me. I'm a beginner of UE4, and I can't make a great effect.
Finally, I hope you can have a good time
QQ group of players: 704743708
